channel.title: Adding Npc Dialouge, Cant Find If(NPCID) [Delta]
channel.description: Where To I Add The Case In Client.java? I Read A Tutorial And Told Me To Find If(NPCID) = ****) { But There Is None.

item.title: Adding Npc Dialouge, Cant Find If(NPCID) [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @CaZz_TaZz CaZz TaZz
item.description:
@CaZz_TaZz wrote:

[quote=“TheLetterQArousesMe, post:5, topic:498804”]Packet 40 :3
rip another dialogue system out if it’s not already there.[/quote]

Yeah I Try Ripping One From Doggyscape But When I Place It In, It Either Gives Me Errors Or Illegal Start Type So WWhere In Client.java Do I Copy+Paste It?

Read full topic

Lordabyssal:

If its a clean source then maybe there is none. Add it yourself.

item.title: Adding Npc Dialouge, Cant Find If(NPCID) [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

Did you search for

If(NPCID) = ****) {
exactly? If so, that's probably why. The astericks are a placeholder for another value. Try searching for simply
if(NPCID)

Read full topic
